meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grotesque.
meanings.sent1: The grotesquenesses of the Halloween decorations made the children giggle.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the grotesquenesses of the monster in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the exaggerated grotesquenesses of the cartoon characters.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a mix of colors and patterns that created a visual grotesquenesses.
meanings.sent5: The movie's special effects added an extra layer of grotesquenesses to the villain's appearance.

meanings.definition: The grotesque elements or features in something.
meanings.sent1: The horror movie was filled with grotesquenesses that made the audience gasp.
meanings.sent2: The novel described the eerie grotesquenesses of the abandoned mansion.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator added edible grotesquenesses to the dessert for a spooky touch.
meanings.sent4: The old painting had hidden grotesquenesses that only the art expert could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour guide pointed out the chilling grotesquenesses in each room.
